dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5927 IH: To require the Secretary of the Interior to withdraw certain documents relating to grizzly bears.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Newhouse introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to withdraw certain documents relating to grizzly bears.

section.header: Withdrawal of certain documents relating to grizzly bears

paragraph.text: shall withdraw the proposed rule of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service titled Endangered and Threatened Wildlife and Plants; Establishment of a Nonessential Experimental Population of Grizzly Bear in the North Cascades Ecosystem, Washington State (88 Fed. Reg. 67193; published September 29, 2023); and

shall withdraw and terminate the preparation of the draft Environmental Impact Statement of the National Park Service and the United States Fish and Wildlife Service titled Draft Grizzly Bear Restoration Plan / Environmental Impact Statement (published September 2023).
